characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Up to 15 models embarked in the Tacticus Bunker can shoot in the Shooting phase, measuring and drawing line of sight from any part of the Tacticus Bunker. Up to 10 models embarked in each TBunker Annex can shoot in the Shooting phase, measuring and drawing line of sight from any part of the Bunker Annex in which they are embarked. In both case, embarked models may shoot even if enemy models are within 1" of their Bunker.
